title: Tools to Manipulate ATO — atools
text: Provides tools manipulate ATO objects. Includes functions filtering, excluding, additional calculations.

text: object ATO ... named arguments filter . argument's name must match one column names detections. one value provided, data excluded exact match. two values provided continuous variables, data filtered within interval provided. three values provided, data filtered exact match. arguments provided, entire slot removed. hard false (default), detections flagged invalid invalid column, kept dataset. Switch true completely remove detections dataset (useful improve performance handling large datasets). Ignored exclusion arguments provided.
